Audio.Locality: Reserva Natural da Vale - Linhares, Espirito Santo
Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Open area with small, scattered trees between humid forest and marsh. 3-4 birds, low down. This is Call B in our DVD-ROM 'Birds of Brazil'.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Columbina talpacoti,Brotogeris tirica,Ramphastos vitellinus,Tolmomyias poliocephalus,Megarynchus pitangua,Pachyramphus marginatus
